message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm asking for $140 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  $125 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $132.50?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?
